short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the 'visit' button in google's image search with , 'View Image'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google made a decision recently to remove the "View Image", and replace it with the, "Visit" button. Here's the application that reverses it for you.

Open source as always:
https://github.com/PrescottGallagher/Re-Tab-Image

Also accepting donations to help keep my apps free:
Paypal.me/PrescottGallagher
